text: What s the point  I mean I know there is no grand point  but just personally  what s the point when you don t have anything left to fight for I ve grown up with so much grief and constant pain everyday  There s nothing that brings me any source of happiness or even contentment  I m incapable of holding onto relationships  mentally I m plagued with panic and heavy heavy depression  Physically I have auto immune issues  and stomach problems which add to my fatigue and drained energy  Identity wise  I ve never felt comfortable in my own skin   I don t really care any more  I m glad that a lot of people have that one thing  I would want them to  That s great  I just think for me I guess that doesn t exist  I wish it would did but it doesn t  and I ve always wanted that one thing  that thing that would make life desirable again  worth fighting for  But there isn t  And part of the problem was I think that there used to be for me  which in turn created this horrid perpetual cycle of grief and internal pain  I don t want to live anymore  but I m grateful for the years I ve had  And I ve made it pretty far  to   I m just exhausted  And maybe that s okay  I wish you all the best  I don t have a plan as of now  but I m guessing in time I will  I m tired of pushing myself to feel  better  when to be completely honest with you  I don t believe  better  is a real thing
summary: There's nothing left to fight for for me. I don't want to live anymore. I'm grateful for the years I've had but I'm tired of pushing myself to feel better. I wish you all the best and don't have a plan yet.
